_header: I conjure the loathly beast with that ilk spear
_description: A charm for the tooth-ache — 14 lines, 5 couplets plus 4 unrhymed lines

Lincoln91.First Lines:
I conjoure the laythely beste with þat ilke spereþat
                    longyous in his hande gan bere…
Lincoln91.Last Lines:
…Bot a waye mote þu wendeTo þe erde & þe
                    stane
Lincoln91.Note:
Nineteenth-century transcription is London,  British Library Egerton 2257, f.
                    98.
Lincoln91.Attributed Title: A charme for þe tethe worke (f. 176rb)
